-------file: "./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=Single]
// The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps.
// Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
// Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
// 
// How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
// " my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
// A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!
// Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.

-------file: "./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=Single, breakstring?width=90&flags=word&eol=none]
// The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz
// graced by fox whelps.
// Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs
// vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
// Bright vixens jump;
// dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim.
// Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
// 
// How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks
// help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
// " my brave
// ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq.
// Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
// A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few quips
// galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox,
// zebra, and my wolves quack!
// Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was
// gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ",
// Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.

-------file: "./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=Single, breakstring?width=90&flags=word&eol=none,text?padleft=]
//The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz
//graced by fox whelps.
//Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs
//vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
//Bright vixens jump;
//dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim.
//Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
//
//How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks
//help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
//" my brave
//ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq.
//Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
//A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few quips
//galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox,
//zebra, and my wolves quack!
//Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was
//gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ",
//Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=multi]
/*
 * The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps.
 * Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
 * Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
 * 
 * How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
 * " my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
 * A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!
 * Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.
 */

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc, breakstring?width=80&flags=word&eol=none]
/**
 * The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog.
 * Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps.
 * Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz,
 * bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs
 * jumpy veldt fox.
 * Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex
 * bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
 * How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick,
 * Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
 * " my brave ghost pled. Five
 * quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy
 * sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
 * A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few
 * quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The
 * jay, pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!
 * Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump.
 * Joaquin Phoenix was gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly
 * in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged
 * for blue quartz.
 */

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=0,text?padleft=0]
/**
 *The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps.
 *Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
 *Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
 *
 *How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
 *" my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
 *A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!
 *Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.
 */

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=4]
    /**
     * The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps.
     * Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
     * Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
     * 
     * How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
     * " my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
     * A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!
     * Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.
     */

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=4,, , text?padleft=6,, ]
    /**
     *      The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps.
     *      Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
     *      Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
     *      
     *      How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
     *      " my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
     *      A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!
     *      Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.
     */

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc,text?padleft= — , breakstring?width=70&flags=word&eol=none]
/**
 * — The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz
 * — prog. Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps.
 * — Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex
 * — nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived
 * — waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
 * — Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl
 * — quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing
 * — daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
 * — 
 * — How quickly daft jumping
 * — zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my
 * — woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
 * — " my brave ghost pled. Five quacking
 * — zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy
 * — sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
 * — A very bad quack might jinx zippy
 * — fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over
 * — the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!
 * — Blowzy red
 * — vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed by MTV for luck.
 * — A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex
 * — Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.
 */

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=bad, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced
by fox whelps.Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs
grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick
wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.How
quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax
jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!" my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed
by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.A very bad quack might jinx
zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay,
pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed
by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun
TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.



-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=pound]
# The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced by fox whelps.
# Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.
# Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.
# 
# How quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!
# " my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.
# A very bad quack might jinx zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay, pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!
# Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=html, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
<!--
The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced
by fox whelps.Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs
grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick
wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.How
quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax
jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!" my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed
by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.A very bad quack might jinx
zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay,
pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed
by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun
TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.
-->

-------file: ("./replace1.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=html, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
<!-- This is the text from replacement 1 -->

-------file: ("./replace1.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
// This is the text from replacement 1

-------file: ("./replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
/*
 * The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. DJs flock by when MTV ax quiz prog. Junk MTV quiz graced
 * by fox whelps.Bawds jog, flick quartz, vex nymphs. Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex! Fox nymphs
 * grab quick-jived waltz. Brick quiz whangs jumpy veldt fox.Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack. Quick
 * wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim. Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim. Sex-charged fop blew my junk TV quiz.How
 * quickly daft jumping zebras vex. Two driven jocks help fax my big quiz. Quick, Baz, get my woven flax
 * jodhpurs! "Now fax quiz Jack!" my brave ghost pled. Five quacking zephyrs jolt my wax bed. Flummoxed
 * by job, kvetching W. zaps Iraq. Cozy sphinx waves quart jug of bad milk.A very bad quack might jinx
 * zippy fowls. Few quips galvanized the mock jury box. Quick brown dogs jump over the lazy fox. The jay,
 * pig, fox, zebra, and my wolves quack!Blowzy red vixens fight for a quick jump. Joaquin Phoenix was gazed
 * by MTV for luck. A wizard’s job is to vex chumps quickly in fog. Watch "Jeopardy! ", Alex Trebek's fun
 * TV quiz game. Woven silk pyjamas exchanged for blue quartz.
 */

-------file: ("./replace4.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?width=200&eol=none&flags=word]
/*
 * This is a multi line from replace 4 with with four
 * lines of text this is to test conditions such as
 * file-("./fixtures/replace4.txt")
 * options-[comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?break=line&eol=encode]
 */
